description: A Quiz object represents a set of questions.

description.description: A brief description of the quiz content, topic...

max_score.description: Maximum score the user can get. Will be used to compute the final score: sum(question_i_score) / max_score.

questions.description: All the questions the quiz is made of.

authors.description: List of optional authors or contributors of the quiz. See {@link Author}.

tags.description: List of optional tags associated with the quiz.

Quizoot.Question.description: Question object used to create a quiz. A Quiz is a set of questions.

question.description: The actual question as a human-readable string.

kind.description: The question kind. Please refer to {@link QuestionKind}.

spec.description:
Spec of the question. It specifies what the attributes of the question are. Attributes depends on {@link QuestionKind}.

See {@link QuestionSpec} for more information about the spec attributes for each question kind.

grading.description: The grading object specifies how to grade for the current question. See {@link Grading}.

difficulty.description: Rate how difficult the question is. See {@link Difficulty}.

tags.description: List of optional tags associated with the question.

hint.description: Hint given to help answering the question

Quizoot.QuestionKind.description: Different kind of question we might have.

Quizoot.QuestionSpec.description: Question spec. It depends on the question kind.

answer_id.description: Id of the correct answer to the question.

display.description: The actual display of the option as a human-readable string.

answers_id.description: Id of the correct answers to the question.

placeholder.description: Placeholder to display in the html `textarea` or `input`

keywords.description: List of keywords that the answers should contain. It is up to the developer to implement if the answer should contain ALL or ANY of the keywords.

max_size.description: Maximum size of each files. Can be expressed in bytes, megabytes (MB), etc. See TODO for valid units.

max_files.description: Maximum number of files to upload.

type.description: File type enum. Can be `.txt`, `.csv`, `.pdf`, etc. See {@link FileType}.

content.description: Encoded `base64` string of the file's content.
Code content. This will be run using a `python3` runner and evaluated.

expected_output.description: Expected output after running the code.

point_value.description: Specifies how much a correct answer count for in the total score.

feedback.description: Feedback given after answering the question.

explanation.description: General feedback/explanation displayed whether the answer is wrong or correct.

Quizoot.Difficulty.description: Question difficulty: easy, medium or hard.

surname.description: The quiz author's last name. Is optional.

pseudo.description: A pseudo for the quiz author.
